projects.name: CherryPeach
projects.description: CherryPeach is a social networking application that allows users to connect with nearby people in real-time. It works without internet or servers, using physical proximity to create direct and secure social interactions, maintaining user privacy by not storing personal data.
features: Social connection based on physical proximity

projects.name: Income Tax Deductions Web
projects.description: Development of a web application that allows users to calculate their income tax deductions based on a form filled with their personal data.
features: Use of AI for intensive documentation analysis
Use of Python for document scraping
Client-based web design to reduce product operational costs
Use of AI for web interface design and development
Use of PHP for server-side filtering and selection algorithms implementation

projects.name: Curriculum Vitae Web
projects.description: Design and development of this same website to demonstrate the potential of AI from the perspective of development team optimization. This project serves as an example of how, through AI, a developer specialized in one field can expand their knowledge and skills to offer a higher quality product and be more versatile.
features: Use of AI for web interface design and development
Use of AI for web optimization for the user
